title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A 8.0 Wifi 2GB RAM 32 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Silver)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Travel Adapter, USB Cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Tablet and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

product_description.Functional Design: This tablet features a lightweight and compact design which makes it easy for you to carry it and use it with just one hand. The lightweight design makes it easy for kids to also use this tablet conveniently.
product_description.Stunning Display: This tablet features a 20.32-cm (8) screen that has a 1280 x 800 pixels resolution. Also, this tablet’s aspect ratio of 16:10 ensures an immersive viewing experience, whether you’re watching a YouTube video or playing games. The dual speakers deliver stunning audio effects, which complements your videos and movies.
product_description.Large Battery Backup: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0 comes with a massive 5100 mAh battery which lets you play games, stream videos, and browse the Web for hours, without having to keep charging this device.
product_description.Power-packed Performance: With 32 GB of internal storage memory, you can store a large number of apps and games on this device. Also, this device’s 2 GB of RAM allows you to quickly switch between watching a movie to shopping on your favorite app without any lag. It also features the Android P OS for a smooth navigation experience.
product_description.Samsung Kids Home and Parental Control F: The Samsung Kids Home feature lets your kids play and learn in a safer environment. The Quick Panel provides access to child-friendly apps so you can let your kids access safe content on this tablet. Thanks to the Parental Control feature, you can not only monitor the usage but also keep a track of the time your kids spend while using this device.
product_description.Share and Create Memories: Even if you stay miles away from your friends and family, you can still keep them updated and stay connected at all times. Through your Samsung account, you can share your photos, calendar entries, and Samsung Notes with them, ensuring distance doesn’t come in between you and your loved ones.
product_description.One UI: This Samsung tablet comes with One UI, which customizes and displays relevant content for you. When you tap on a particular content, it gets focussed, so you get to read the details and information without getting distracted by the other data on the screen.

review: Good Tab for normal usage. Value for money... Worth buying.... This type of yba need fast charger and fast charging support

i m using this tab from last 2 weeks & find it useful for moderate usages such as reading , music quite good with Dolby , battery is tremendous , display for 720p videos only not full HD videos , overall it is Worthy in this price range.

This is a must have in every student's essentials specially for how compact it is and how easily it can be carried anywhere.It is so lightweight and slim that it easily fits in my handbag.The screen-size and ratio is genuinely awesome.Reading e-books or watching course videos and movies have a different kind of feel now,solely because of the screen-size and dual speakers which gives an enriched viewing experience.No matter how much I watch videos or read articles, this device ain't gonna give up easily because of its massive 5100 mah battery.For students,it isn't possible for us to charge the device quite a few times in a day but I think I got the perfect solution for it.The Samsung Galaxy A8 which doesn't give up before one and a half days even with over usage.The performance is pretty smooth with its 2GB RAM and its expandable memory is just terrific,512GB.It makes sure we never run out of memories.The kids mode is another feature that won my heart.My 11 year old brother can use it too and me and my parents will have the assurance that he ain't being the victim of any cybertrap as we are the ones who decide what he's gonna see and for how much time.Lastly it's camera is too awesome.With an 8mp,it clicks crisp and clear images of every memorable moment of our lives.Overall the Samsung Galaxy A8 tablet is an absolute blockbuster product.I would recommend this to every school/college going student as it will help them not only with their studies but will help create a better image of themselves because of its style that carries a classic atmosphere with itself.

Samsung Galaxy A8 Tab is one of the most affordable tabs in the market right now. It offers very good features at a reasonable price.
Features including like:-
Screen Size and Ratio 20.31cm (8") Tablet of 1280x800 resolutions (WXGA) with TFT basic display having 16M color depth. Camera 8.0 Megapixels rear camera with auto focus. 2.0 MP front camera.Processor, RAM & Storage. CPU Speed of 2Ghz with Quad Core processor. Also has 2GB RAM size and 32GB ROM size with only 21.3 GB is available memory. But you can expand up to 512GB MicroSD card.
Battery Life is excellent as it has massive 5100mAh capacity approx. It can work for 3-4 days easily. It’s a very light and agile Tablet weighing only 345 grams. You can carry it easily and comfortably to the work or in college.. After a long time, I’ve come across a Tablet having Dual Speakers which is really good for kids because there will be no use of earphones to listen to music and videos. It also has a kids mode and hence my younger sister can enjoy and have fun with creative and good learning applications in the mode.

A marvellous product with huge display,its easy to carry it on meetings,journeys,etc.the large screen made me read my novels more efficiently.its storage capacity is great and i got astonished when i came to know that it has android nine pie in it,it is a compatible product in this price segment but 4GB RAM would be great and will add a sweet touch in its performance and working.Huge battery of 5100mAh gives a power packed performance and a long leading battery life which helps me to do long tasks and help me to attend my online classes without having to keep charging my device. its huge 18inch display help me to notice wack and every detail and help me to do my desk work more efficiently and effectively.i can now complete my assignments more easily and efficiently with this tab as earlier it was difficult for me to do the same on a short screen as i had to constantly zoom in and zoom out it,this tab has overcome my problem.overall it is a great device for me in this price range and with such great features compared to other devices in the same price range.

Amazing choice when priority is to studies and reading.. also it has fabulous Dolby atmos speakers which is I think best thing about it..camera is again good for technical purposes and not at all for photography, photoshoot and even casual clicking the pictures.... product looks premium indeed...battery life is outstanding in given price range... its compact and easy to carry anywhere with very good screen ratio ...overall performance is satisfying comparing its 10k price.... one of the best options for budget friendly student's tablet!

Samsung's new One UI is very informative as it is very easy to use the device with one hand now. overall a really good product and I would highly recommend this tablet.

Writing this review after 10 months of thorough usage.
*Design :
Aluminium back, plastic frame, thick bezels and rectangular shape. A typical samsung 2018 design.
It doesn't look extraordinary but still it looks premium, feels pricier.
I would suggest you to go with the silver color as it looks premium.
*Display:
A tft display with a low resolution. Yes the resolution is low and pixelation is evident but at this price you just can't complain.
Viewing angles are good, and colors look natural.
Once you get used to it you will not feel it but yes the display resolution is poor by today's standards.
*Performance :
This tab is just for basic tasks like online classes, reading pdfs and media consumption.
It has a dated Snapdragon 425 quad core processor with 2 gigs of ram. Yes a quad core in 2021 😂
It can handle day to day tasks fine but don't expect it to perform amazingly.
*Software :
It is currently running Android 11 with one ui 3.1
Samsung is the king of updates, my smartphone is stuck on android 10 but this meagerly powered tab is running Android 11 with latest security patch.
Good job Samsung 👌
*Battery :
This is where this tab truly shines.
Amazing battery life, 14hr plus of screen time.
I do 6hr online classes everyday and it lasts me 2 days easily.
Charging is slow via the 7.5w charger that Samsung bundles in the box, although the tab supports 10W charging.
*Camera :
Just does the job.
Rear camera can take good photos in ample sunlight, but who takes photos with a tab ?
Front cam is fine for video calls and online classes.
*CONCLUSION :
This is the best budget tab for students and binge watchers.
Cheers!

I'm so in love with this tablet. It basically comes up in two colors: silver and black. Both colors are supercool and the tablet looks extremely amazing! It is lightweight and easy to carry. Being in college you can't really carry that heavy laptop everyday but a tablet can be carried easily. I love how now I am able to do all my engineering software work on this tablet with ease. The 5100 mAh battery lasts for my entire day even after using this tablet all the time. It's got 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage which I guess is more than enough for me. Moreover the sd card slot provides us with a 512GB storage. Then there's this cool feature of Samsung kids which is amazing for all of my younger siblings and their entertainment. It's safe for kids and offers educational stuff for quick learning. The camera's got a 8mp resolution while the screen size extends upto 20.31 cm(8"). It's got dual speakers wherein the quad core cpu type offers a 2GHz speed and is quick enough to display the apps easily. The best tablet I've ever come across and basically is a must buy product! ❤️

it is one of of the best tab with an incredible battery backup it is insane as it has 5100mah battery so it can work up to 2 days also means you can watch videos and play games like pubg for many hours . the speakers are excellent as it is very loud and clear the display of 8 inch is a big enough for all many multimedia needs it has a latest Android which is Android 9.0 pie and with One UI. It is very easy to use the tablet with one hand .
overall it is a really good product for his price and I recommend everyone who is looking for a tab to get this one.

I purchased this device few days back on Flipkart and I'm really happy to make a smart decision. Samsung A 8.0 tab is just the perfect fit for anybody who is looking to purchase a tab in a budget of under 10000. Few features like dual speakers, large screen, lightweight, attractive looks are all checked in my personal checklist while choosing a tablet.

I usually work on college projects and hence I wanted a tablet with a huge screen and a lightweight machine which could be carried to college everyday. Additionally, the battery which is actually a beast (5100 mAh) helps me to use the tablet for hours and hours without getting drained. I am not a great photographer though but the camera in this tab is pretty cool as well and the photos clicked come out beautiful.

Talking about streaming my favourite shows on Netflix was definitely fun since the colours are pretty vibrant. Getting all this for 10,000 Rs. is definitely a dream come true.

Firstly I am buying a tablet for the first time and I would like to share my experience. Buying this Samsung A 8.0 is amazing. I have taken this tablet for my sister who is, all the time, watching series and I thought of buying this tablet for her and because of the Kids Mode feature, it is very handy. Secondly, this is so comfortable to carry everywhere as it is lightweight. The battery of 5100mAh is so extra amazing. My sister also carries this to the school for her project work. She also loves it and even the price of this tablet is so reasonable. The Dual Speakers have Dolby Atmos which makes the sound quality, very clear. It is an amazing product to buy from Flipkart
